resources.string: In single player mode your opponent will be device itself.First you have to select the symbol with you want to play with.The result of the game will be declared by a short message which will appear in the bottom of the screen.If you want to play more,you have to press yes on the alert box.

In multiplayer mode,you need to have two player.Atfirst you have to chose a player symbol with which the payer wants to play.The result will be declared by a short message which will appear in the bottom of the screen.If you want to play more,you have to touch yes on the alert box.
